title: Horror Stories
description: A teenager is abducted and forced to tell the scariest tales she knows, leading to an anthology of four stories.

title: The Hangover
description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

title: After
description: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.
